resources.string: You will get an active notification on the status bar while an app is using your camera or microphone.
Click on the above Switch and Turn on the Privacy Indicator in the Accessibility Settings
This feature enables Camera Indicator which will notify every time when a third-party app tried to access your Camera.
This feature enables Microphone Indicator which will notify every time when a third-party app tried to access your Microphone.
This feature enables sound when someone tries to access your Camera/Microphone.
View the summary of Camera and Microphone usage by various apps.
You can customise how indicators to be appeared. Configure the look of Indicators

When this service is enabled it lets \'Spyonist App\' to display indicators every time a third-party app or a service uses camera or microphone on any screen. \n\nThis Service/App doesn\'t have any permission to use internet or your device\'s camera, microphone or any other Hardware. And will NOT gather any data whatsoever.
Get notified every time a third-party app uses camera or microphone
Select the Camera/Microphone enabled apps to Show/Hide the indicators and play sound
